mapper.select:
SELECT rpt_print_no rptPrintNo ,insu_term_1 insuTerm1
,diagnosis_disease_3 diagnosisDisease3 ,diagnosis_hospital_3 diagnosisHospital3 ,insu_mortgage_1 insuMortgage1 ,insu_mortgage_dtl_1 insuMortgageDtl1 ,insu_mortgage_value_1 insuMortgageValue1
,face_insured_job_6 faceInsuredJob6 ,past_hospital_6 pastHospital6
,inspect_point_4 inspectPoint4 ,inspect_result_4 inspectResult4
,sagodoc_flag sagoDocFlag FROM top_rpt_print_1 WHERE suim_rpt_no = #{suim_rpt_no}

SELECT serial_no serialNo ,rpt_print_no rptPrintNo ,investigate_to_date investigateToDate ,investigate_from_date investigateFromDate ,investigate_date_dtl investigateDateDtl
,investigate_outline investigateOutline ,investigate_dtl investigateDtl FROM top_rpt_print_1_6_1 WHERE rpt_print_no = #{_parameter} ORDER BY serial_no

SELECT serial_no serialNo ,rpt_print_no rptPrintNo ,other_insu_com otherInsuCom ,other_insu_dtl otherInsuDtl ,other_insu_contract otherInsuContract FROM top_rpt_print_1_2 WHERE rpt_print_no = #{_parameter} ORDER BY serial_no

SELECT serial_no serialNo ,rpt_print_no rptPrintNo ,attach_name attachName ,attach_copy attachCopy ,attach_etc_memo attachEtcMemo FROM top_rpt_print_1_8 WHERE rpt_print_no = #{_parameter} ORDER BY serial_no

SELECT serial_no serialNo ,rpt_print_no rptPrintNo ,assure_dtl assureDtl ,join_amount joinAmount ,estimation_amount estimationAmount FROM top_rpt_print_1_assure WHERE rpt_print_no = #{_parameter} ORDER BY serial_no

SELECT serial_no serialNo ,rpt_print_no rptPrintNo ,control_date controlDate ,control_subject controlSubject ,control_memo controlMemo ,control_end_date controlEndDate ,control_delay_agent controlDelayAgent ,control_date_cnt controlDateCnt ,control_delay_cnt controlDelayCnt FROM top_rpt_print_1_ctrl WHERE rpt_print_no = #{_parameter} ORDER BY serial_no
SELECT printctrl_all_delay_cnt allDelayCnt ,printctrl_insu_delay_cnt insuDelayCnt ,printctrl_notinsu_delay_cnt notInsuDelayCnt FROM top_rpt_print_1 WHERE rpt_print_no = #{_parameter}

SELECT serial_no serialNo ,rpt_print_no rptPrintNo ,detail_gubun detailGubun ,detail_title detailTitle ,detail_content detailContent FROM top_rpt_print_1_detail_check WHERE rpt_print_no = #{rptPrintNo} AND detail_gubun = #{gubun} ORDER BY serial_no

SELECT serial_no serialNo ,rpt_print_no rptPrintNo ,detail_gubun detailGubun ,detail_title detailTitle ,detail_content detailContent ,detail_content_sub detailContentSub ,use_flag useFlag
FROM top_rpt_print_1_detail_check
WHERE rpt_print_no = #{rptPrintNo}
ORDER BY serial_no ASC
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO top_rpt_print_1 (suim_rpt_no) VALUES (#{suim_rpt_no})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

INSERT INTO top_rpt_print_1_detail_check ( rpt_print_no ,detail_gubun ,detail_title ,detail_content ,use_flag ) VALUES ( #{rptPrintNo} ,99 ,#{detailTitle} ,#{detailContent} ,'1' )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
